original_text: And Jehoiada took for him two wives; and he begat sons and daughters.
korean_text: 여호야다가 그를 두 아내에게 장가들게 하였더니 자녀를 낳았더라

sentences.original_text: And Jehoiada took for him two wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호야다가 그를 위해 아내 두 명을 맞이했고

sentences.original_text: and he begat sons and daughters
